content.text:
<objective>
Create all phases necessary to close gaps identified by `/gsd:audit-milestone`.

Reads MILESTONE-AUDIT.md, groups gaps into logical phases, creates phase entries in ROADMAP.md, and offers to plan each phase.

One command creates all fix phases — no manual `/gsd:add-phase` per gap.
</objective>

<execution_context>
@/Users/noahdolevelixir/.claude-elixirtrials/get-shit-done/workflows/plan-milestone-gaps.md
</execution_context>

<context>
**Audit results:**
Glob: .planning/v*-MILESTONE-AUDIT.md (use most recent)

**Original intent (for prioritization):**
@.planning/PROJECT.md
@.planning/REQUIREMENTS.md

**Current state:**
@.planning/ROADMAP.md
@.planning/STATE.md
</context>

<process>
Execute the plan-milestone-gaps workflow from @/Users/noahdolevelixir/.claude-elixirtrials/get-shit-done/workflows/plan-milestone-gaps.md end-to-end.
Preserve all workflow gates (audit loading, prioritization, phase grouping, user confirmation, roadmap updates).
</process>

# v2.1 Milestone Audit: E2E Testing & Quality Evaluation

**Milestone Goal:** Automated E2E testing against Docker Compose stack with quality evaluation — grounding success rates, structuring accuracy, and a full bug catalog.

**Audited:** 2026-02-18
**Status:** gaps_found

---

## Requirements Coverage

### 3-Source Cross-Reference

| Requirement | Phase | VERIFICATION.md | SUMMARY Frontmatter | REQUIREMENTS.md | Final Status |
|-------------|-------|-----------------|---------------------|-----------------|--------------|
| E2E-01 | 37 | missing | — | Pending | **partial** (no verification) |
| E2E-02 | 37 | missing | — | Pending | **partial** (no verification) |
| E2E-03 | 37 | missing | — | Pending | **partial** (no verification) |
| E2E-04 | 36 | missing | — | Pending | **partial** (no verification) |
| E2E-05 | 36 | missing | — | Pending | **partial** (no verification) |
| E2E-06 | 37 | missing | — | Pending | **partial** (no verification) |
| QUAL-01 | 38 | missing | — | Pending | **partial** (no verification) |
| QUAL-02 | 38 | missing | — | Pending | **partial** (no verification) |
| QUAL-03 | 38 | missing | — | Pending | **partial** (no verification) |
| QUAL-04 | 38 | missing | — | Pending | **partial** (no verification) |
| QUAL-05 | 38 | missing | — | Pending | **partial** (no verification) |
| QUAL-06 | 38 | missing | — | Pending | **partial** (no verification) |
| QUAL-07 | 38 | missing | — | Pending | **unsatisfied** (criteria_text bug) |
| BUG-01 | 39 | missing | — | Pending | **partial** (text excerpts blank) |
| BUG-02 | 39 | missing | — | Pending | **partial** (no verification) |
| BUG-03 | 39 | missing | — | Pending | **partial** (text excerpts blank) |
| BUG-04 | 39 | missing | — | Pending | **partial** (no verification) |
| BUG-05 | 39 | missing | — | Pending | **partial** (no verification) |
| FIX-B3 | 41 | missing | — | Pending | **partial** (no verification) |
| FIX-B4 | 41 | missing | — | Pending | **partial** (no verification) |
| FIX-B5 | 41 | missing | — | Pending | **partial** (no verification) |
| FIX-B12 | 41 | missing | — | Pending | **partial** (no verification) |
| FIX-B14 | 42 | passed | [FIX-B14] | Complete | **satisfied** |
| FIX-B15 | 42 | passed | [FIX-B15] | Complete | **satisfied** |
| FIX-B13 | 42 | passed | [FIX-B13] | Complete | **satisfied** |
| FIX-B7 | 43 | missing | [FIX-B7] | Complete | **satisfied** (code verified, SUMMARY claims complete) |
| FIX-B6 | 43 | missing | [FIX-B6] | Complete | **partial** (human checkpoint pending) |
| FIX-B8 | 43 | missing | [FIX-B8] | Complete | **partial** (human checkpoint pending) |

**Score:** 4 satisfied / 1 unsatisfied / 23 partial = **4/28 fully verified**

**Note:** Most "partial" statuses are due to missing VERIFICATION.md files — the code implementation exists per SUMMARYs but formal phase-level verification was never run. The integration checker confirmed wiring is correct for most of these.

---

## Phase Verification Status

| Phase | VERIFICATION.md | SUMMARY Count | Status |
|-------|-----------------|---------------|--------|
| 36 | Missing | 2 | Unverified |
| 37 | Missing | 1 | Unverified |
| 38 | Missing | 2 | Unverified |
| 39 | Missing | 1 | Unverified |
| 40 | human_needed (8/9) | 2 | Mostly verified |
| 41 | Missing | 2 | Unverified |
| 42 | human_needed (4/4) | 2 | Verified (human items remain) |
| 43 | Missing | 1 (of 2) | In progress |

---

## Integration Check Summary

**Connected:** 24/28 wiring paths verified
**Broken:** 1 confirmed break (criteria_text field name mismatch)
**Pending:** 2 items need runtime verification (pybreaker async = resolved, Phase 43 UI = pending checkpoint)

### Critical Integration Issue

**`criteria_text` → `text` field name mismatch in `scripts/quality_eval.py`**

Lines 391, 460, and 653 use `criterion.get("criteria_text")` but the API `CriterionResponse` model returns the field as `text`. This silently corrupts all criterion text in:
- LLM heuristic assessment prompt (QUAL-07)
- Bug catalog text excerpts (BUG-01, BUG-03)

**Fix:** Change `criteria_text` to `text` in all three locations.

---

## Tech Debt Summary

| Phase | Items | Severity |
|-------|-------|----------|
| 36-39 | 4 phases missing VERIFICATION.md | Medium — code works per integration check but no formal verification |
| 38 | criteria_text field name bug | High — silently corrupts report output |
| 40 | CLEAN-0x IDs absent from REQUIREMENTS.md | Low — traceability gap only |
| 40 | Live E2E pipeline not confirmed with rebuilt Docker image | Medium — unit tested but not integration tested |
| 41 | No VERIFICATION.md | Medium |
| 42 | MLflow end_trace(ERROR) in finally block on success paths | Low — cosmetic in MLflow UI |
| 43 | Plan 02 checkpoint pending human approval | Medium — code committed but not visually verified |

**Total:** 12 items across 8 phases

---

*Audited: 2026-02-18*
*Auditor: Claude (audit-milestone orchestrator)*

content.thinking:
Let me analyze the audit gaps and group them into phases.

**Gaps from the audit:**

1. **QUAL-07** (partial) - criteria_text field name mismatch in quality_eval.py
2. **BUG-01** (partial) - criterion text excerpts blank due to same mismatch
3. **BUG-03** (partial) - structural issue text excerpts blank due to same mismatch
4. **FIX-B6** (partial) - Phase 43 Plan 02 not yet approved by human
5. **FIX-B8** (partial) - Phase 43 Plan 02 not yet approved by human


6. **CLEAN-01 through CLEAN-05** (orphaned) - requirement IDs missing from the traceability table
7. **Integration break** - the criteria_text to text field mismatch cascading through quality_eval.py

I'm seeing two main problem areas: the field name mismatch that's breaking quality report generation, and the pending human approval for Phase 43 Plan 02. The orphaned requirements also need to be traced back to REQUIREMENTS.md. Prioritizing by impact, the field mismatch is blocking the milestone since it affects multiple quality and bug reports, while the approval and traceability issues are secondary. B6, FIX-B8 — Phase 43 Plan 02 is already in progress. These just need the human checkpoint to complete.

**Should (recommended):**
- CLEAN-01 through CLEAN-05 — orphaned requirements need to be added to REQUIREMENTS.md traceability table

**Nice-to-have:**
- Missing VERIFICATION.md files (4 phases) — the code works, just no formal verification
- Tech debt items (MLflow end_trace, bind mount vs named volume, etc.)

Phase 43 is already moving forward with Plan 02 pending, so FIX-B6 and FIX-B8 will wrap up once that completes. The real work ahead is the criteria_text field name fix affecting QUAL-07, BUG-01, and BUG-03—just a 3-line change in quality_eval.py—plus adding those 5 orphaned requirement IDs to the REQUIREMENTS.md traceability table. Both are small enough to bundle into a single phase. I'm thinking Phase 44: Quality Report Fix & Traceability Cleanup, which would handle the criteria_text correction across its 3 locations and document the CLEAN requirements properly.

content.text: Now let me check the current phase directories.

Now I have the full picture. Let me present the gap closure plan.

## Gap Closure Plan

**Milestone:** v2.1 E2E Testing & Quality Evaluation
**Gaps to close:** 8 requirement gaps, 1 integration break, 1 broken flow

### Analysis

The audit found three categories of gaps:

**Category 1 — Active bug (criteria_text field mismatch)**
- **QUAL-07**: LLM assessment receives empty criterion text
- **BUG-01**: Ungrounded entity text excerpts blank in report
- **BUG-03**: Structural issue text excerpts blank in report
- **Integration break**: `criteria_text` vs `text` in `scripts/quality_eval.py` (lines 391, 460, 653)
- **Root cause**: Single 3-line fix

**Category 2 — Orphaned requirements (traceability only)**
- **CLEAN-01 through CLEAN-05**: Requirements satisfied in codebase but absent from REQUIREMENTS.md traceability table
- **Fix**: Add 5 rows to traceability table, mark as Complete

**Category 3 — Already handled by Phase 43 Plan 02 (in progress)**
- **FIX-B6**: Frontend ProtocolList dedup — code committed, awaiting human checkpoint
- **FIX-B8**: Frontend Retry/Archive buttons — code committed, awaiting human checkpoint
- These will resolve when Phase 43 Plan 02 completes. **No new phase needed.**

### Proposed Phases

**Phase 44: Quality Report Fix & Traceability Cleanup**
Closes:
- QUAL-07: Fix criteria_text → text in quality_eval.py (3 locations)
- BUG-01: Same fix restores ungrounded entity text excerpts
- BUG-03: Same fix restores structural issue text excerpts
- CLEAN-01 through CLEAN-05: Add to REQUIREMENTS.md traceability table
- Integration: scripts/quality_eval.py → api-service CriterionResponse field name alignment
- Flow: "Quality Report Generation" restored to working
Tasks: ~3 (field name fix, traceability table update, verification)

### Not addressed (resolved by existing work)

- **FIX-B6, FIX-B8**: Phase 43 Plan 02 (in progress) handles these
- **Missing VERIFICATION.md files**: Tech debt, not blocking milestone completion
- **MLflow end_trace cosmetic issue**: Low severity, not blocking

---

Create this 1 phase? (yes / adjust / defer optional)

questions.question: Create Phase 44 (Quality Report Fix & Traceability Cleanup) to close the audit gaps?

options.label: Yes, create Phase 44 (Recommended)
options.description: Creates 1 gap closure phase closing QUAL-07, BUG-01, BUG-03, CLEAN-01-05. FIX-B6/B8 handled by in-progress Phase 43.

options.label: Adjust
options.description: Modify the grouping, split into more phases, or change scope

options.label: Defer all
options.description: Skip gap closure phases for now
